column2: Kellner 25mm, Orion Sirius 10mm, Orion Shorty 2x Barlow. TV Panoptic 24mm, Plossl 20mm, Nagler 7mm, Vixen SLV 5mm, Bresser 2x SA

column5: Ptolemy Cluster. C114F8, Venice (IT). Large and beautiful open cluster. It was just above the horizon and the last cluster visible if moving towards East.
